mapper.select: SELECT yc.*, ycr.replyContent replyContent, tmua.yh_tx yhTx, tmua.yh_mch yhMch FROM y_comment yc LEFT JOIN t_mall_user_account tmua ON yc.userId = tmua.Id LEFT JOIN y_commentreply ycr ON yc.id = ycr.id LEFT JOIN y_hotspot yh ON yc.hotPointId = yh.id WHERE hotPointId = #{hotPointId} and yc.state=1 order by yc.createTime desc
mapper.update: update t_mall_user_account set sumsource=sumsource+200 where id=#{userId}
